title: Children crossing
creator_credit: Don Anderson and Tasmanian Government Film Unit
brief_description: The patrol officer system in Tasmanian schools and its success in avoiding road accidents to children. Volunteers are trained by Road Safety Officers in supervising children at dangerous road crossings, on school buses and public transport. The status of school patrol officers and the extent of their authority.
